eu.smartdatalake.simsearch.engine.processor.ranking

Class ThresholdRanking<K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.smartdatalake.simsearch.engine.processor.ranking.RankAggregator<K,V>
      • eu.smartdatalake.simsearch.engine.processor.ranking.ThresholdRanking<K,V>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRankAggregator

    public class ThresholdRanking<K,V>
extends RankAggregator<K,V>
    Implementation of the threshold-based rank aggregation algorithm.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ThresholdRanking

        public ThresholdRanking(Map<String,DatasetIdentifier> datasetIdentifiers,
                        Map<String,Map<K,V>> lookups,
                        Map<String,ISimilarity> similarities,
                        Map<String,Double[]> weights,
                        Map<String,INormal> normalizations,
                        Map<String,Thread> tasks,
                        Map<String,RankedList> queues,
                        Map<String,IValueFinder> valueFinders,
                        Map<String,AtomicBoolean> runControl,
                        int topk,
                        Logger log)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        datasetIdentifiers - List of the attributes involved in similarity search queries.
        lookups - Dictionary of the various data collections involved in the similarity search queries.
        similarities - Dictionary of the similarity measures applied in each search query.
        weights - Dictionary of the (possibly multiple alternative) weights per attribute to be applied in scoring the final results.
        normalizations - Dictionary of normalization functions to be applied in data values during random access.
        tasks - Collection of running threads; each one executes a query and it is associated with its respective queue that collects its results.
        queues - Collection of ranked lists (priority queues) collecting results from each search query.
        valueFinders - Dictionary of the random access operations available for the attributes involved in the similarity search.
        runControl - Collection of boolean values indicating the status of each thread.
        topk - The count of ranked aggregated results to collect, i.e., those with the top-k (highest) aggregated similarity scores.
        log - Handle to the log file for notifications and execution statistics.

    • Method Detail

      • fetchPartialResult

        private PartialResult fetchPartialResult(String taskKey)
        Provides the next partial result from a queue. Results already examined due to random access are skipped.
        Parameters:
        taskKey - The hashKey of the task to be checked for its next result.
        Returns:
        A partial result from this queue to be used in rank aggregation.

      • updateRankedList

        private boolean updateRankedList(String taskKey)
        Inserts or updates the ranked aggregated results based on a result from a queue.
        Parameters:
        taskKey - The hashKey of the task to be checked for its next result.
        Returns:
        A Boolean value: True, if the ranked aggregated list has been updated; otherwise, False.

      • updateScoreRandomAccess

        private double updateScoreRandomAccess(AggregateResult res,
                                       int w)
        Calculates the total aggregated score of a query result by randomly accessing its attribute values.
        Parameters:
        res - The query result.
        w - The identifier of the weight combination to be applied on the scores.
        Returns:
        The aggregated score after estimating the missing scores in unseen attributes.

      • proc

        public IResult[][] proc(long query_timeout)
        Implements the processing logic of the threshold-based algorithm.
        Specified by:
        proc in interface IRankAggregator
        Overrides:
        proc in class RankAggregator<K,V>
        Parameters:
        query_timeout - Max execution time (in milliseconds) for ranking in a submitted query.
        Returns:
        Array of the aggregated top-k results.

      • reportExtraResults

        private void reportExtraResults()
        Complement top-k final results approximately by picking extra items with descending aggregate scores from the queue.
